short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform YouTube into a distraction-free. Block recommendations, hide comments, set time limits, and stay focused on what matters.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform YouTube into a distraction-free environment with customizable focus features and time management tools.
YouTube Focus helps you stay productive while using YouTube by removing distracting elements and managing your viewing time. Perfect for students, professionals, and anyone looking to maintain focus.

Key Features:
• Customizable distraction blocking
• Session time limits with visual countdown
• Dark mode support
• Clean, minimalist interface
• Time management tools
• Distraction-free homepage
• Notification controls
• Video end-screen controls

Benefits:
✓ Increased productivity
✓ Better time management
✓ Reduced distractions
✓ Enhanced focus
✓ Improved learning experience

Perfect for:
• Students doing research
• Professionals watching tutorials
• Content creators
• Anyone wanting a cleaner YouTube experience

Privacy & Security:
• No data collection
• Works offline
• No external servers
• Open source

Installation is quick and easy. Start focusing on what matters today!
